--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Frank McCo=

>
> Michael Stack wrote:
> > <snip>
> > See the tab=
s. Click on 'Arguments'. There are two places to fill in

re are application arguments and JVM arguments. I
> > usually put into the =
top textbox '--run' so I don't have to go to the
> > extra step of setting =
this in the UI. The lower textbox is where you
> > set '-Dheritrix.developm=
ent' system property.

se try again. I'm not sure I understand what you are asking. Is
